kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Dado que acesso na página de cadastro de produtos
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Text
kw.msg: ${Nome} = Debitis laudantium vel suscipit temporibus inventore. Ratione eius laborum eaque iure sunt corporis officiis. Pariatur officiis excepturi debitis quos neque.
kw.doc: Generate a text string.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Debitis laudantium vel suscipit temporibus inventore. Ratione eius laborum eaque iure sunt corporis officiis. Pariatur officiis excepturi debitis quos neque.' into text field 'id:nome'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Generate a string with each placeholder in ``text`` replaced according to the following rules:

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Texts
kw.msg: ${Descricao} = ['Fugit esse nesciunt provident quod odio. Ipsam dolorem dolorem ut fugiat. Eum reiciendis in inventore consectetur commodi totam.', 'Iure impedit at ut. Aliquam blanditiis accusantium ab expedita. Cu...
kw.doc: Generate a list of text strings.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '['Fugit esse nesciunt provident quod odio. Ipsam dolorem dolorem ut fugiat. Eum reiciendis in inventore consectetur commodi totam.', 'Iure impedit at ut. Aliquam blanditiis accusantium ab expedita. Cupiditate labore consequuntur deserunt.', 'Minus distinctio quasi saepe perspiciatis sequi quos eos. Similique aut fugiat optio.\nTotam maiores dicta cupiditate veritatis excepturi inventore aperiam. Corporis neque eum nulla voluptas.']' into text field 'id:description'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Então visualizo a página de listagem de produtos
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
